abstract.t: This memo defines the Initial Entries for the Performance Metrics Registry. This version includes: * Addition of Loss Ratio metric in various sections (multiple metrics per section). * All section 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8 parameters reference YANG types for alternate data formats. * implementation of standard naming format for parameters. * implementation of many IANA early-review comments. Still need: Add MBM metric entry.
